name: Callable - Calculate Total Invoiced Per PO Line
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: receive_request
code.description: New call for Coupa - Calculate Total Invoiced Per PO Line

input.service_name: Coupa - Calculate Total Invoiced Per PO Line
input.reply_schema_json: [{"control_type":"number","label":"Invoice Total for PO Line","parse_output":"float_conversion","name":"invoiced_total","type":"number","optional":false},{"control_type":"number","label":"Invoice Accounting Total for PO Line","parse_output":"float_conversion","name":"invoiced_accounting_total","type":"number","optional":false},{"control_type":"text","label":"Invoice Currency","name":"invoiced_currency","type":"string","optional":false,"hint":"if all invoice lines use the same currency, then this will be the currency of the invoice lines.  If the currency is different, it will be \"accounting_currency\""}]

block.name: create_list
block.comment: Create a helper list to do multiple fetches of invoices lines if there are more than 50

block.name: __adhoc_http_action
block.title: Custom action

extended_input_schema.name: path
extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://rapid7-test.coupahost.com/ - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

block.comment: Note that some of the URL parameters have to be specified in the path because Workato escapes them if you include them in the URL parameters field

block.name: map
block.comment: We have to map to the Coupa Invoice data object because coupa uses "-" in their JSONs which is not supported by Workato

list_item.schema: [{"name":"invoice_id","type":"string","optional":true,"label":"Invoice ID","control_type":"text"},{"name":"invoice_status","type":"string","optional":true,"label":"Invoice Status","control_type":"text"},{"name":"line_num","type":"integer","optional":true,"label":"Invoice Line Num","control_type":"integer"},{"name":"invoiced","type":"number","optional":true,"label":"Invoice Line Total","control_type":"number"},{"name":"invoiced_accounting","type":"number","optional":true,"label":"Invoice Line Accounting Total","control_type":"number"},{"name":"invoice_line_status","type":"string","optional":true,"label":"Invoice Line Status","control_type":"text"},{"name":"invoice_line_currency","type":"string","optional":true,"label":"Invoice Line Currency","control_type":"text"}]

block.comment: If there are less than 50 items in the search results, stop the loop
If the error is "no more lines to fetch", then continue with the job.  Otherwise report the error.

block.name: update_variable
block.title: Update variable invoiced_currency
block.comment: If the currency is different among the Invoice Lines, then use the "accounting_currency"
If all the Invoice Lines use the same currency, then use that currency (the value stored in the invoiced_total variable)

block.name: send_reply
block.description: Return response from Coupa - Calculate Total Invoiced Per PO Line

properties.label: Invoice Accounting Total for PO Line
properties.name: invoiced_accounting_total

properties.label: Invoice Currency
properties.name: invoiced_currency
properties.hint: if all invoice lines use the same currency, then this will be the currency of the invoice lines.  If the currency is different, it will be "accounting_currency"
